===Noun===
{{ja-noun|かごめ かごめ}}

# A [[Japanese]] [[children]]'s [[game]], similar to {{w|blind man's buff}}: The one in the middle is the demon, or 'It'. The demon has to keep their eyes covered while the others sing or chant and circle around him. When they stop, the demon has to guess who is sitting behind them.
